item.title: Homeassitant 部署
item.description: Homeassitant docker 安装 docker-compose.yml version: "3" services: homeassitant: container_name: homeassistant image: homeassistant/home-assistant restart: unless-stopped network_mode: host privileged: true # environment: # - https_proxy=http://172.16.8.168:8123 volumes: - /root/homeassistant/config:/config - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro 创建并运行 docker docker-compose up -d HACS 安装 (Integrations of the community store/社区插件) 如果 hacs 没有安装, 可以手动安装 # 进入do
